game.name: Forest Camp Story
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 공기 좋은 숲속 캠핑장 경영 시뮬레이션 게임! 가게를 운영하면서 동물들도 만나자!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Create and customize your own campground in this charming pixel art sim game.

reviewHighlights.text: theres to many things going on at 1 time and too diffrent screens u have to manage but it looks good on season change at the campground i give it a pl...
Definitely one of my favourite Kairosoft games! Love the idea of managing a store on the side, super cozy game uwu
